Title: Little Mustachioed Shit
Writer: Jenji Kohan (creator), Sian Heder, Piper Kerman (book), Sian Heder (story editor), Lauren Morelli (story editor), Nick Jones (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Michael Harney
Plot: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. After Bennett framed Pornstache, problems arise. And a big secret between Piper and Polly is revealed.
